subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: In his first regular PGA Tour event, Brooks Koepka surged to the top of the leader board in the Frys.com Open in San Martin, Calif., with a seven-under-par 64.
snippet: In his first regular PGA Tour event, Brooks Koepka surged to the top of the leader board in the Frys.com Open in San Martin, Calif., with a seven-under-par 64.
